title: Lid of Circular Cosmetic Container with Birth God
description:
One wooden lid to a box of circular form with a representation of the god Bes incised on the top. Incisions filled with a yellowish paste (?). Two protrusions from the lid, opposite each other have holes for attachment to the rest. One yellow wooden knob still in place. 
Condition: Excellent. One separation in the wood running with the grain.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
